Name: Jack Collins
Ingredients: 60 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
TOP with soda and briefly stir.
Review: Apple brandy makes a great base spirit in this refreshing classic.
History: A Collins named after its "applejack" (apple brandy) base, although calvados apple brandy is now commonly used.
Nutrition: One serving of Jack Collins contains 199 calories
